name: Vertical Trello Tasklist for 21x9
description:
Vertical (yeah, vertical !!) layout for the board, and columns sizes adapted for 21x9. 
A version is available for 16/10 and 16/9.
additional_info:
- Revamp of the board to make it vertically scrollable and see all your work in a mouse scroll !
- List header have been styled to be more classy.
- The text of labels have been un-hidden for you to assign various categories !
- Icons size (avatar, deadline) have been lowered down.
- Lists have a maximum height for obvious reasons.
- Several minor CSS fixes.

Notes : I tried to create a masonry style, but it wasn't very convincing (weird lists organization).
